feed.title: Hemmelig Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: implement a password generator by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/369 32d78c8 - fix: awkward || bug <@bjarneo> 5ed2db2 - chore: update all translations using AI <@bjarneo> cae5027 - feat: new ux for the max view component <@bjarneo> ea83ac4 - chore: show as list for small devices <@bjarneo> eb96791 - chore: adjust insert button <@bjarneo> 2a7e90e - chore: set as 2x2 grid <@bjarneo> a1effca - feat: add initial password generator <@bjarneo> 88ebefa - docs: update wording <@bjarneo> f921043 - docs: add analytics to docs <@bjarneo> edd90e0 - chore: allow creators <@bjarneo> 661b952 - fix: remove the most visited path analytics for now <@bjarneo> 593242d - chore: move hard coded strings to translation <@bjarneo> 570cb55 - fix: the avg views wording <@bjarneo> c4a8952 - fix: do not show max views if prevent burn is set <@bjarneo>

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.4.3...v6.5.0

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.5.1
entry.content: ea8958e - chore: remove unwanted text <@bjarneo> c81c7fd - chore: reduce the text size for password injection <@bjarneo> Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.5.0...v6.5.1

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.5.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Dutch by @ltguillaume in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/375
  • refactor: move the password generation to a button with predefined settings in the quill toolbar by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/376
  • feat: new structure of the UI by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/379
  • chore: update all translations using AI by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/370

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.5.2...v6.5.3
